attributes.action: Abolish plans to implement a congestion charging system in Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Manchester does not need a congestion charge.  It is not a similar situation to that of London. It could create havoc for small businesses and have an adverse effect on visitors to this wonderful city.  Why do we pay road tax if the entire country is going to be paying other road charges left right and centre?  It is a very unfair taxation and Manchester does not need it.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Manccongestion/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
